channel.title: Titanic! Why?! No clue!
channel.description:
Got a 'little' Titanic obsession....Don't ask. >_> So, I was bored and started making this. Not very detailed at ALL, I just wanted to get the very basics on so I could start putting in all of the little details....And re-make the decks, just put them in there to see what it'd look like with the funnels.
Anywho! Pics:
Front/side: [IMG]http://i553.photobucket.com/albums/jj374/AD_Setsuna/titanicpic1.jpg[/img]
Back: [IMG]http://i553.photobucket.com/albums/jj374/AD_Setsuna/titanicpic2.jpg[/img]
Side: [IMG]http://i553.photobucket.com/albums/jj374/AD_Setsuna/titanicpic3.jpg[/img]
And then my friend messed with it and made a sinking model.
Right after breakup: [IMG]http://i553.photobucket.com/albums/jj374/AD_Setsuna/titanicmodelsinking.jpg[/img]
Did I make this for rs servers? Hell no...No real purpose for it. I was just bored.
Yes, I know it sucks. Like I said above...Very basic(s).
Please post all flame/comments/ideas!

item.title: Titanic! Why?! No clue!
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“jjones10, post:59, topic:284961”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=376597.msg2846370#msg2846370 date=1246304804]

No make it big Make it part of the map so its walkable and you can explore it and stuff =O that would be awesome!

So, another thing is make it a map edit? Is that what your saying? Because that would need new maps, and to make it like the real titanic, at least 20 levels.
[/quote]
Yeah! explore the Client hack section and find a map editor and create a big PK are with 5 different floors on it. And then if you know java, animate it so when there is one person left the sjip cracks in halp and you fall into a whirlpool and it teleports you to home with everyones expensive loot in your inventory. How bad ass would that be if they put that in a 508+ server?? :)[/quote]

No thank you.

If I did add it into a server…It’d be for exploring and for fun…Although that would take some large amount of time…But, I did have an idea for that “like 20 floors” thing…Could just…Put each floor in a different area, I mean…It would be big enough to do that…Though, I do not believe I myself would be able to scale my model up to that size and add it successfully to a client.

I will, however, try doing that explore idea. I will need to make a bunch of new models for the interior, though…

Read full topic
